A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film was fantastic!  I loved how unpredictable it was and how Rian handled this franchise.  I especially enjoyed the fact that he went against the Fan Fiction \"Canon\" and carried the mantle on with LucasFilm.  Those complaining about it not sticking to canon are simply frustrated that they wasted their time reading something that was merely written by fans and had nothing to do with LucasFilm.  Overall\, it was shot wonderfully and was a perfect balance between the old and new.
